query.selectPlaceCode: SELECT * FROM WORK_PLACE_CODE_TBL #addWhere ORDER BY WORK_PLACE_CODE #addPaging ;
query.selectPlaceCodeTotal: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_SIZE, max(WORK_PLACE_CODE) as LAST_CODE FROM WORK_PLACE_CODE_TBL;
query.selectPartCode: SELECT * FROM WORK_PART_CODE_TBL #addWhere ORDER BY WORK_PART_CODE #addPaging ;
query.selectPartCodeTotal: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_SIZE, max(WORK_PART_CODE) as LAST_CODE FROM WORK_PART_CODE_TBL;
query.selectComplexCode: SELECT * FROM WORK_COMPLEX_CODE_TBL #addWhere ORDER BY WORK_COMPLEX_CODE #addPaging ;
query.selectComplexCodeTotal: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_SIZE, max(WORK_COMPLEX_CODE) as LAST_CODE FROM WORK_COMPLEX_CODE_TBL;
query.selectLineCode: SELECT * FROM WORK_LINE_CODE_TBL #addWhere ORDER BY WORK_LINE_CODE #addPaging ;
query.selectLineCodeTotal: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_SIZE, max(WORK_LINE_CODE) as LAST_CODE FROM WORK_LINE_CODE_TBL;
query.selectEqpScrCode: SELECT EQP_SN FROM EQP_SCR_MGR_TBL #addWhere ORDER BY SCR_CODE #addPaging ;
query.selectTeamCodeTotal: select COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_SIZE from USER_TEAM_CODE_TBL;
query.selectGroupCodeTotal: select COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_SIZE from USER_GROUP_CODE_TBL;
query.selectPositionCode: select * from USER_POSITION_CODE_TBL #addWhere ORDER BY POSITION_CODE desc #addPaging ;
query.selectPositionCodeTotal: select COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_SIZE from USER_POSITION_CODE_TBL;
query.selectDutyCode: select * from USER_DUTY_CODE_TBL #addWhere ORDER BY DUTY_CODE #addPaging ;
query.selectDutyCodeTotal: select COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_SIZE from USER_DUTY_CODE_TBL;

query.selectBayCodeTotal: select COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_SIZE, max(WORK_BAY_CODE) as LAST_CODE from WORK_BAY_CODE_TBL;
